description:
Oda Nobunaga is a famous warlord who conquered most of Japan during Sengoku period. He is known for being the daimyo who took the first step of unification of the Japan, and the first Japanese military commander to utilize arquebuses in battles, using one as his main weapon in battle as a http://anidb.net/ch86429 [Drifter]. Historically, he died during the Honnou-ji incident, the mutiny conducted by http://anidb.net/ch11507 [Akechi Mitsuhide].
As a Drifter, he has only aged six months since arriving in the new world. Nobunaga is highly ambitious and cunning, desiring to establish a multiracial federation in the new world with http://anidb.net/ch79268 [Toyohisa] as their leader. Nobunaga acts as the group`s military strategist.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Oda Nobunaga
